definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)

sentences.english: A compound slide with tool post sits between them.
sentences.chinese: 複合投影片與工具後坐在他們之間。

sentences.english: If you're starting out, you'll need tools to till the soil.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是個新手，你需要工具把地整理得適合種菜。
叉形工具用於翻轉棧板。

sentences.english: The tools of media will become more easy to use and more affordable.
sentences.chinese: 媒體工具會變得更加容易操作，更加便宜。

sentences.english: Union was a tool used by the capitalists in their vain attempt to damp down the labour movement.
sentences.chinese: 那個黃色工會是資本家妄圖用來撲滅工人運動的工具。

sentences.english: A powerful personal growth tool is the 30-day trial.
sentences.chinese: 有一種個人成長的有效工具，叫做“30天試驗”。

sentences.english: From this viewpoint, globalisation is a kind of phenomenological tool for making sense of the world.
sentences.chinese: 從這個觀點看，全球化是個認識世界現象的邏輯工具。

sentences.english: Kaifeng City is the only one strong sales of the quality of the machine tools company.
sentences.chinese: 是開封市唯一一家銷售質量過硬的機械工具的公司。

sentences.english: Currently, I'm the general engineer of Shenyang Machine Tools Plant in charge of Quality control.
sentences.chinese: 目前我任瀋陽機械工具廠總工程師，負責質量控制。

sentences.english: Is the office near public transport, either the subway or a bus station?
sentences.chinese: 新辦公室離公共交通工具，地鐵或者公共汽車站近嗎？

sentences.english: A screwdriver and a hammer are the only tools you need.
sentences.chinese: 你需要用的工具只是改錐和錘子。

sentences.english: Mypricemap is a smart shopping tool for all shoppers.
sentences.chinese: 比翻天是一個讓消費者聰明購物的工具。

sentences.english: Unity is a very convenient tool for multi-platform game development.
sentences.chinese: Unity是一款非常方便的跨平臺遊戲開發工具。

sentences.english: The shovel is the one tool that Davis and his fellow principal investigators do not use.
sentences.chinese: 鏟子是戴維斯和他的主要調查者棄之不用的工具。

sentences.english: Early in the development lifecycle, one uses simulation and analysis tools.
sentences.chinese: 在開發週期的前期階段，使用仿真和分析工具。

sentences.english: The Death Star was to be an instrument of terror, meant to cow treasonous worlds with the threat of annihilation.
sentences.chinese: 死星是恐怖的工具，用毀滅來恐嚇叛國的星球。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
